Los_Angeles.KFWB: KFWB is a Los Angeles AM radio station airing a classic Regional Mexican music format at 980 kHz. KFWB is owned by Lotus Communications Corporation and operates with 5,000 watts of power from a non-directional antenna shared with KLAC near Lincoln Park in Eastside Los Angeles. The station had a mostly all-news format from 1968 until September 8, 2009, after which it converted to a news-talk format.
